issue.title: C++: IPC should depend on rapidjson_ep if RapidJSON is vendored
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-422](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-422). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When we vendor RapidJSON, there is currently no dependency specified in the CMakeLists that the IPC sources are depending on RapidJSON. Thus `make` might try to compile the IPC sources before downloading RapidJSON and then will error.
